A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Good:  FX and space battles.  It feels like the Star Wars universe.  \nThe Bad:  I hate how all the original trilogy's heros have been treated in these last 2 movies.  I'm not sold on Kylo Ren as the \"Big Bad\".  Snoke being a paper tiger\, and much ado about nothing.  Yoda bringing the lightning a la Thor from beyond the grave.  Jake Skywalker because that Can Not Be LUKE!   Honestly\, in this day and age of reboots\, This movie proves that the last two in this series both need to be rebooted.
